author: Rotten Tomatoes Trailers
description:
Michael B. Jordan, Hailee Steinfeld, Wunmi Mosaku, Miles Caton, Jayme Lawson, Jack O'Connell, Li Jun Li, Delroy Lindo, Omar Miller, and director Ryan Coogler sit down with RT's Jacqueline Coley to talk about their upcoming movie ‘Sinners’. The cast shared what it was like working with 2 Michael B. Jordans, what music inspired the film, what it was like working on a horror movie set, and so much more. See ‘Sinners’ in theaters April 18. Get tickets now! 

► Buy Tickets for Sinners: https://www.fandango.com/sinners-2025-237956/movie-overview?cmp=Trailers_YouTube_Desc 
► Learn more: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/sinners_2025?cmp=Trailers_YouTube_Desc

title: The ‘Sinners’ Cast Share What It Was Like Working With 2 Michael B. Jordans
